con:part.con:content: <definitions name="GreetingGatewayServiceService" targetNamespace="http://ws.esb.samples.redhat.com/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://ws.esb.samples.redhat.com/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://ws.esb.samples.redhat.com/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="hello" type="tns:hello"/> <xs:element name="helloResponse" type="tns:helloResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="hello"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="helloResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </types> <message name="GreetingGatewayService_hello"> <part element="tns:hello" name="hello"/> </message> <message name="GreetingGatewayService_helloResponse"> <part element="tns:helloResponse" name="helloResponse"/> </message> <portType name="GreetingGatewayService"> <operation name="hello" parameterOrder="hello"> <input message="tns:GreetingGatewayService_hello"/> <output message="tns:GreetingGatewayService_helloResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="GreetingGatewayServiceBinding" type="tns:GreetingGatewayService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="hello"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="GreetingGatewayServiceService"> <port binding="tns:GreetingGatewayServiceBinding" name="GreetingGatewayServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://127.0.0.1:8080/custom-ws-gateway-ws/greeting"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
